definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Mountain half marathon in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 山一半在杯的马拉松隆起，不列颠哥伦比亚，加拿大。

sentences.english: Sunday's marathon was the eighth for the 27-year-old, who has been running for more than a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 上周日的马拉松比赛是这位27岁的女性第八次参赛。

sentences.english: He romped home in the marathon race.
sentences.chinese: 他在马拉松赛跑中轻而易举地获胜。

sentences.english: Let's say, your brother just ran a marathon.
sentences.chinese: 假设你的哥哥参加了一场马拉松赛跑。

sentences.english: "Marathoners run until they fall down, " she said.
sentences.chinese: “马拉松运动员就是跑到倒下为止，”她说。

sentences.english: In fact, startups are more like marathons, so pace yourself.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，创业更象马拉松，所以，保持你的节奏。
一个5小时的马拉松选手呢？

sentences.english: On the other hand, the ultra-marathoner might outlive us all.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，终极马拉松运动员可能比我们都要长寿。

sentences.english: In 1995, he ran in a 100km ultramarathon.
sentences.chinese: 1995年他参加了100公里超级马拉松。

sentences.english: Grassland Extreme Marathon 2011 Ml Mth RankingBib No Name Gender …
sentences.chinese: 年中国铁木真国际草原马拉松极限挑战赛。

sentences.english: And Marathon looks on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 马拉松凝望着海涛汹汹。

sentences.english: I am currently training for a half marathon.
sentences.chinese: 我当前正为了半程马拉松进行训练。

sentences.english: He ran 18 marathons before dropping to shorter distances.
sentences.chinese: 他赛了18次马拉松后才改短跑的。

sentences.english: But after the marathon, he's done too much.
sentences.chinese: 跑完马拉松以后，他已经精疲力尽了。

sentences.english: I'm you the Hilltop School Skating Marathon.
sentences.chinese: 我是在高山学校溜冰马拉松赛的现场向您报道。

sentences.english: His marathon speech was not able to convince us.
sentences.chinese: 他的马拉松式的演说没能说服我们。

definition: ultramarathon/abbr. for 超級馬拉松|超级马拉松[chao1 ji2 ma3 la1 song1]
to start running/the start of a race
to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
